Description: Papyrus; 1 line of Coptic text written along the fibres on one side; 7 written against the fibres on the other. EA 75320, 75319, 75318, 75317, 75316, 75315 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380766) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380766)
